title: Non Existent Clause
text: There does not exist a WHICH clause in SQL.

title: Clause with a Different Purpose $$1$$
text: The FROM starting a clause is not used to filter, and instead is used in SQL to specify the origin of data.

title: Clause with a Different Purpose $$2$$
text: To filter from a condition, the AS would not be appropriate because AS specifies an alternate name for a field.
